Author: Adhithya#1999
Content:
**Oscillating magnetic fields**

 Sine wave current in each of the **three stationary coils** produces three sine varying magnetic fields perpendicular to the rotation axis. 

The three magnetic fields add as vectors to produce a single rotating magnetic field.

https://imgur.com/a/O060GZN
